text: @rsmithsoil @RossCherrington @EnvAgencySW @SoilsAlliance That is a convex feild and a clay loam...a concave slope on a sand left bare and funneling run off. Wrong field choice for high risk crop like parsnips. We can't be apologists for choices like this.

@rsmithsoil @RossCherrington @EnvAgencySW @SoilsAlliance if a shower generates run-off you don't need a named storm. Soil saturates most yrs in sept, after which it can't be driven on with harvesters without causing damage. If this farming model is legal what hope do our rivers have. Slope length is enormous where have the hedges gone?

entity.name: Good Morning Britain
entity.description: Good morning, Britain. Up early and need to catch up on the latest news, weather and sports? Then this weekday morning programme is for you, offering the latest information in such areas as entertainment, health and money. `Good Morning Britain' is the typical morning news and talk show. It features a number of presenters, correspondents and reporters covering what you should know to start your day before heading out the door.
